articles.title: Launch of Europe's 1st-ever Jupiter probe is just a week away - Space.com
articles.description: The Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer is scheduled to lift off on April 13.
articles.content: After its arrival in the final assembly building on April 1, 2023, ESA’s Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer (JUICE) spacecraft was slowly lifted into the air and then carefully lowered onto the top of the Ar… [+3190 chars]

articles.author: Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: What we know about the deadly tick-borne virus detected in the UK - The Indian Express
articles.description: TBE is already common in many parts of Europe and is an important cause of viral infections in the central nervous system, according to the World Health Organization.
articles.content: After cases were spotted across the UK, authorities have warned of the “likely” presence of tick-borne encephalitis (TBE) in the country. The UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA), in an official stateme… [+2459 chars]
